snippet: Mitt Romney has scaled back his acceptance of a program by President Obama to grant reprieves from deportation to hundreds of thousands of young illegal immigrants.
abstract: Mitt Romney has scaled back his acceptance of a program by President Obama to grant reprieves from deportation to hundreds of thousands of young illegal immigrants.

headline.main: Romney Dials Back Acceptance of Obama Immigration Program
headline.print_headline: Romney Revises Position on Deporting Young Illegal Immigrants

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
